title: Construction of continuous controlled K-g-fusion frames in Hilbert spaces
abstract: We present the notion of continuous controlled K-g-fusion frame in Hilbert space which is the generalization of discrete controlled K-g-fusion frame. We discuss some characterizations of continuous controlled K-g-fusion frame. Relationship between continuous controlled K-g-fusion frame and quotient operator is being studied. Finally, stability of continuous controlled g-fusion frame has been described.
journal_ref: ACTA ET COMMENTATIONES UNIVERSITATIS TARTUENSIS DE MATHEMATICA, Volume 28, Number 1, June 2024
comment: 19 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2110.11234, arXiv:2108.01467, arXiv:2111.03389
